attributes.action: Put the Brexit options to a public referendum.
attributes.additional_details: There should be a debate explaining the position of each deal. Pros and cons. Let the public decide if we keep the backstop. Or leave on WTO terms.
attributes.background: If parliament can not agree a withdrawal deal to leave the EU then offer the deal or no deal options to a public referendum. If the people put us here the people should decide the course of action.
